DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize control trial test acceptability , feasibility preliminary efficacy interactive computer-based intervention individualize feedback promote sexual health adolescent young adult assessment behavioral biomarker outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize control trial test acceptability , feasibility preliminary efficacy interactive computer-based intervention ( ICBI ) individualize feedback promote sexual health adolescent young adult . The intervention use physician avatar use element motivational interview elicit sexual risk behavior motivation change risky behavior . Feedback include instructive video module . Participants ask identify one behavior change reassess 3-month follow-up interim sexual behavior include condom birth control use . Participants test chlamydia , gonorrhea , pregnancy ( female ) baseline 3-month follow-up .
DOC.criteria: English speaking read Report least one episode unprotected vaginal sex ( condom OR birth control ) last 2 month Not currently pregnant actively seek pregnancy self partner Currently pregnant actively seek pregnancy self partner
DOC.keyword: reproductive health , condom , sexually transmit disease , contraception
